name: Dirt Mound

exits.description: The little garden outside your lab is visible to the North.
There is no path in this direction.
There is no path in this direction.
There is no path in this direction.
The path continues to another hill with a crevice at its peak to the South.
There is no path in this direction.
There is no path in this direction.
There is no path in this direction.
You see the clear blue sky and the sun.
The dirt on this mound is soft enough to dig into, had you a shovel.

description: You are standing on a fairly generic dirt mound, rising slightly above the surrounding grass.  To the North the lab buildings open up into a little garden.  To the South the path continues towards a larger hill.
